## Checklist (remove items that do not apply)
- [ ] I have read the contributing guidelines.
- [ ] I followed the project's coding conventions.
- [ ] My changes include tests where applicable.
- [ ] I ran lint/format and fixed issues locally.
- [ ] I tested the changes manually (steps and environment below).
- [ ] I updated documentation or README if needed.

## Testing / QA steps
Describe how a reviewer can test these changes locally, including commands and expected results.

If the change affects UI, include before/after screenshots or a short recording.
